Text: If we get the tax structure right, this will … create thousands of jobs … help fund the State's capital plan … and stop the flow of over $200 million in gaming revenue to Indiana.
Cause: If we get the tax structure right, this will
Effect: create thousands of jobs … help fund the State's capital plan … and stop the flow of over $200 million in gaming revenue to Indiana.
